title.rendered: Financial Commission Announces Trade99 as Latest Approved Member

content.rendered:
June 4, 2019, The Financial Commission, today announces Trade99 as its newest approved Member.

Trade99 status as an A-category Member of the Financial Commission took effect on June 4, 2019, following the approval of its membership application by the Financial Commission, thus allowing the company and its customers access to a wide range of services and membership benefits including, but not limited to, protection for up to €20,000 per submitted complaint, backed by the Financial Commission’s compensation fund

Financial Commission provides brokerages and their customers with an unbiased 3rd party mediation platform that helps resolve complaints in instances when parties are unable to directly come to an agreement over disputes.

For approved members and their clients participating in CFDs, foreign exchange (forex) and cryptocurrency markets, Financial Commission helps facilitate a simpler, swifter resolution process than through typical regulatory channels such as arbitration or local court systems.

Trade99 joins a diverse range of brokerages and independent services providers (ISPs) that utilize the services of the Financial Commission and as part of their commitment to their clients while upholding membership requirements.

About Trade99

Trade99 (Nohelious International Marketing Operations Limited) was founded in 2019 by a veteran management team with over 50 accumulated years of experience in the financial markets. Our management team comes from a solid pedigree with vast experience in the industry and understands what retail crypto traders need in order to trade effectively, smoothly, and securely. We are not just content by keeping up with developments in the crypto world – our commitment to our customers is a constant, never-ending improvement of services.

The Trade99 team is a unique blend of industry leading serial fintech entrepreneurs, financial consultants, bankers, legal advisors, blockchain inscription specialists, and cybersecurity experts, focusing on financial markets and blockchain technology development.

Trade99 provides a leveraged cryptocurrency-based asset trading platform, a simplified solution aimed towards every trader of all levels of experience.

Our Services allow you to enter into transactions which give you an opportunity for exposure to the price movement of various underlying assets, such as securities, commodities, indices and other financial instruments, without purchasing or gaining control in the underlying assets.

Trade99 is obligated to comply with the highest standards of compliance and regulations, inter alia, with respect to KYC&AML procedures, GDPR and privacy policies, full transparency, and disclosures policies, corporate governance, internal and external audits etc.

For more information, please contact Trade99: cs@trade99.io

About Financial Commission

Financial Commission is an independent external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for consumers/traders who are unable to resolve disputes directly with their financial services providers that are members of the Financial Commission. Financial Commission initially set out to provide a new approach for traders and brokers alike to resolve any issues that arise in the course of trading electronic markets such Foreign Exchange, and then expanded into CFDs and related derivatives, in addition to certifying technology platforms used for trading.

For more information please contact us at info@financialcommission.org.
